titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Paul Russell Papers, approximately 1991, 1998

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

did.abstract: Manuscript and typescript drafts of the novels Boys of Life and The Coming Storm.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Paul Russell is Professor of English at Vassar College. He is the author of several acclaimeed novels, including The Salt Point (1991), Boys of Life (1992), The Coming Storm (1999), and The Unreal Life of Sergey Nabokov (2011), as well as the non-fiction work, The Gay 100 : a Ranking of the Most Influential Gay Men and Lesbians, Past and Present (1995). He received an AB from Oberlin College, and an MFA, MA, and PhD from Cornell University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Manuscript and typescript drafts of the novels Boys of Life and The Coming Storm.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research according to the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library without any additional restrictions.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to quote (publish) from unpublished or previously published material must be obtained as described in the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Paul Russell Papers, Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries.

dsc.head: Container List
dsc.p: There is no container list currently available for this collection.
